name: market for miscanthus rhizome, for planting | miscanthus rhizome, for planting | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8769/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'miscanthus rhizome, for planting', in the Global geography.;This product is generally considered to be used at the production site.  Therefore, the market does not contain any transport.;The product 'miscanthus rhizome, for planting' reprents rhizomes for plant propagation. Rhizomes are harvested 4 years after establishment of the plantation. Miscanthus is an annual crop often used for bioenergy.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'miscanthus rhizome, for planting',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  miscanthus rhizome, for planting', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
